item.title: Today’s Wordle #1715: Hints and Answer for February 28, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1715 for February 28, 2026

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, February 28, 2026

The Wordle answer for game #1715 is another hard puzzle. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 5.3 out of 6 guesses. That makes it ever-so-slightly harder than the 5.2-guess average from February 27.

General Wordle Hints For February 28

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word refers to a specific creature, not a general category.
  • Hint 2: It’s most often encountered in mythological or symbolic contexts.
  • Hint 3: The thing it names is known more for its distinct traits than its appearance.
  • Hint 4: You’re more likely to see this word in stories or references than in everyday conversation.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1715 for February 28, 2026.

Starter Words For February 28, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • RADAR
  • DRAMA
  • HARDY
  • HYENA

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1715 On February 28, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: HYDRA

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

HYDRA is a noun that describes, from classical mythology, “a water or marsh serpent with nine heads, each of which, if cut off, grew back as two; Hercules killed this serpent by cauterizing the necks as he cut off the heads.”

Outside of mythology, it also means “any freshwater polyp of the genus Hydra and related genera, having a cylindrical body with a ring of tentacles surrounding the mouth, and usually living attached to rocks, plants, etc., but also capable of detaching and floating in the water.”

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1714 on February 27, 2026

Answer: DIZZY

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1715?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on March 1 will be Wordle Game #1716.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

For even more Insider Gaming delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter

Mike has been covering the gaming industry since 2012, and has reported on some of the largest events in the industry while also working as an investigative reporter. Outside of…

More from Mike Straw

item.title: WWE 2K26 Soundtrack Revealed — Linkin Park, Bad Omens, More Featured
item.content:encoded:
The full soundtrack for WWE 2K26 has been revealed.

Soundtracks in wrestling games can be very essential to the experience. The songs featured in any video game help set the tone for the action. In WWE games, they can sometimes be used as entrance themes or just hype players up prior to any given match. Most importantly, the songs featured in the game ultimately become tied to the memories players form.

Recent WWE video games have featured a mix of music genres spanning many decades. Iconic WWE soundtracks in the past have featured bands like Breaking Benjamin, the Dillinger Escape Plan, and the Red Hot Chili Peppers. Other acts such as Kid Rock, Kanye West, Poppy, and Bring Me the Horizon have also been featured. Now, it’s time to look at the full soundtrack for WWE 2K26.

Full WWE 2K26 Tracklist

The WWE 2K26 Soundtrack features plenty of hard rock. Powerman 5000’s “When Worlds Collide” makes its return to WWE games. It had been one of the featured songs in the original WWE SmackDown vs. Raw title back in 2004.

Andrew WK’s “Party Hard” also lands on the soundtrack. Bad Omens x ERRA’s “Anything > Human,” and Turnstile’s “Dull” represent today’s era of Rock.

Check out the full soundtrack below:

  • “Dull” – Turnstile
  • “Two Faced” – Linkin Park
  • “Reckless” (feat. Denzel Curry) – Hanumankind
  • “Extral” – Jennie
  • “Diamonds and Guns” – Transplants
  • “When Worlds Collide” – Powerman 5000
  • “Anything > Human” – Bad Omens x ERRA
  • “Cruising to Self Soothe” – Ecca Vandal
  • “Qué Más Quieres” – The Warning
  • “Party Hard” – Andrew W.K.
  • “Bender” (feat. Travis Barker) – The Paradox
  • “Lie Between the Lines” – Better Lovers
  • “The Black Curtain” – Gatecreeper
  • “Man Made of Meat” – Viagra Boys
  • “Upside Down” – Ho99o9
  • “Heathens” – The Mistakes

WWE 2K26 is set to release worldwide on March 13. Premium edition purchases provide 7-Day Early Access.

Are you excited for WWE 2K26’s soundtrack? Sound off in our official Discord server. For more WWE 2K26, learn about the changes coming to DLC via the Ringside Pass. Also, don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Super Pocket Rare Edition Brings 14 Titles Including Banjo-Kazooie
item.content:encoded:
Play classic Rare games, including Banjo-Kazooie, Evercade cartridges, and more on the brand new Super Pocket Rare Edition. The handheld, which is made by HyperMegaTech, is slated for release in June 2026. An exact date has not been specified.

The handheld, which is made by HyperMegaTech, is slated for release in June 2026. An exact date has not been specified.

The item will be priced at $69 in the United States of America. It will also cost £49 in the United Kingdom and €59 throughout other parts of Europe. Pre-orders are available now.

What Games Will Be Playable on Super Pocket Rare Edition? Built-In Titles Explained

In addition to the ability to play Evercade cartridges, the handheld will have 14 Rare-developed classic titles built in. The 14 games span a wide range of the company’s history, including their days making games for the ZX Spectrum.

Popular titles like Battletoads are also included, as is Conker’s Pocket Tails, the Game Boy Color predecessor to Conker’s Bad Fur Day on the Nintendo 64

Check out the full list of games below:

  • Atic Atac
  • Banjo-Kazooie
  • Battletoads in Battlemaniacs
  • Battletoads
  • Cobra Triangle
  • Conker’s Pocket Tails
  • Gunfright
  • Jetpac
  • Knight Lore
  • Lunar Jetman
  • R.C. Pro-Am II
  • Slalom
  • Snake Rattle’N’Roll
  • Solar Jetman

Are you excited for this forthcoming handle? Will you be pre-ordering? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Battlefield 6 1.2.1.5 Update Improves Stability and Gameplay
item.content:encoded:
Updates have been announced for Battlefield 6 in version 1.2.1.5

The Battlefield Communications team announced the next update to the game. This next update focuses on quality-of-life improvements, stability fixes, and the resolution of issues across a wide variety of game modes and overall gameplay.

Touted Quality-of-Life Updates Coming to Battlefield 6

The new update is scheduled to go live on March 3. Among the major updates are additional stability improvements to prevent crashes. Also, the team says they have improved the front-end for a smoother experience.

Plus, they say they’ve restored missing Store items to player inventory. These items are from the Bountiful Harvest, Pax Vanguard, and Devil Dogs bundles.

Additional Improvements Coming in New Update

Other updates to Battlefield 6 that players may be interested in include updated spawn logic with an additional out-of-combat area check to prevent unintended spawn locations. Also, they have addressed the issue that saw Battle Pass rewards on the active path could display placeholder text or missing icons.

On the REDSEC front, they’ve tackled the issue in Battle Royale Duos where pings weren’t displayed in the elimination feed. Also, they fixed the issue where the Tracking Pulse Recon trait could activate when destroying any deployable gadget.

Other issues related to Portal stability, audio, and more were addressed. Players can check out the full statement here.

Do these improvements make you want to play more Battlefield 6? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
